p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*

th_98: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_101: Program provides iPads loaded with educational apps and reading materials. Department supports travel for research presentations with ample research opportunities. Away rotations include pediatrics (CHOP), Fox Chase Cancer Center, AIRP (tuition paid). 9 hours of didactics/case conference per week with 1 hour of physics. All residents participate in national informatics, ACR healthcare economics course and earn IHI quality/patient safety basic certificate.
